thread.title: Report: Pilots fired after selfies with Playboy model
thread.title_full: Report: Pilots fired after selfies with Playboy model

title: Report: Pilots fired after selfies with Playboy model
text:
Viky Xipolitakis posted the photos to her Twitter account showing her posing between the pilots with the cockpit controls behind them, ABC reported. 
A video obtained by ABC showed a pilot showing her how flight controls work. 
Xipolitakis has apologized via social media, but that has not helped save the pilots’ jobs. 
Patricio Zocchi Molina and Federico Matias Soaje were fired by Aerolineas Argentinas on June 25, ABC News reported. 
"Also criminal proceedings against the above-named and against the passenger involved will be initiated under Article 190 of the penal code for putting the flight’s safety at risk," the Argentinean airline said in a statement. Recommended
